channel.title: How to run a server on windows 7 (64-bit)
channel.description: I've got a windows 7 computer and i'm not sure how to add a classpath would any of you midn helping me to add a classpath because i really want to run my server on windows 7 and how do i get a runner to work?

item.description:

This should work, not sure though as I don’t have Windows 7.

C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe
